channel.title: Help With Fixing Doors And Gangplanks Etc That Dont Work And Deleting Objects
channel.description: Ok Guys I Need Help Badly Here In My Server I Need To Fix A Gangplank To Get Onto A Boat That Doesint Work <<<< Answered <<<<< ...... I Need Help On How To Remove Objects That Are Already There Etc The Fountain In Varrock, What Would I Do To Delete I Tried The Global Objects Thing But It doesint Seem To Work Could Like Someone Talk Me Through It Pl0x And Ty :D

Ahh Thanks That Helped Alot :P[br][size=1]Posted on: May 20, 2007, 12:06:13 PM[/size][hr] :eek: Nobody Knows On How To Remove Objects That Are Already There?

item.title: Help With Fixing Doors And Gangplanks Etc That Dont Work And Deleting Objects
item.dc:creator: @PatScape PatScape
item.description:
@PatScape wrote:

For the gangplank/door, the gangplank needs to have a case. What ever the ID is.

case ####:
Then it needs a tele command. You can add an if statement, or just a tele. find the coordinates on the boat, and add them here.

case ####: teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; sendMessage("You board the ship.");

now with an if statement, such as if you have to be a certain level.

[code]case ####:

if(playerLevel[0] >= 80)
{
teleportToX = ####;
teleportToY = ####;
sendMessage(“You board the ship.”);
}
else
{
sendMessage(“You need 80 attack to board.”);
}[/code]

For the doors, you are going to need to use something similar to this.

if ((objectX == 3231 && objectY == 3433)) { face = -3; //South
that tells it which way to face. now add a case for the door ID:

case #### face = //0 for west, -1 for north, -2 for east, -3 for south (the direction you want it to face after being opened)

And sorry, I have no clue on deleting globals.

Read full topic
item.source: Help With Fixing Doors And Gangplanks Etc That Dont Work And Deleting Objects
